data.message: Great! Now all these fuck heads aka teenagers and 90s baby are gona start to burn out these rappers and act all gangster #gtfoh uhh nothig annoys me more than little kids who think they know "nwa" and real of rap. Like shit when I was 6 I started to listen to this because my uncle Made me listen to it with the first song he played was fuck the police

replies.message: Some 90's babies were raised on this music because their parents jammed to it. Born in 93 and I only love old school rap aside from Kendrick, J.Cole and Tech N9ne. I think it's good that the younger generation listen to good rap. When they hear good rap maybe they will demand that rappers today step their game up.
That's the problem Angelica they don't listen to enough good real rap. I like Em and yelawolf. Now those two are good rappers for this generation. So is TI,  Kendrick, Hopsin, BOB...I can give a few

Haha thanks Alex!!! I just listen to alot of real shit, shit that i can relate to. Shit about the struggles and about being hurt by love. No shit about twerking and making money i mean it sounds tight to turn up to at the club but when i cruise in my ride i like to hear me some relevant shit that i can relate to and just get away.
Well I started listening to it when I was 1. Now what!!!
yeeaa Ely! these fake rappers think it all a game &business, they ain't spitting from passion of rap music
Rap music wasnt made just for you anyone can enjoy it even if they're a punk lil teenager
it must hurt. being this stupid
